THE RED FILE :: Weekly Blotter

Thanks for your interest in the FREE weekly email subscription to the Weekly Blotter!

A FREE weekly version of our soon-to-be available digital magazine THE RED FILE, the Weekly Blotter keeps murder mystery & crime fiction fans informed about the latest short stories, novellas, novels and MurderWiki articles available on the site.

By subscribing today, you'll instantly recieve a copy of the exciting murder mystery novella:

THE CAMPAIGN FOR VENGEANCE

by John Baer

READ TIME: 1 HR AND 15 MINS

After her beloved brother, Captain Jimmy Cornell, was found dead, with a small, white card on his chest bearing the words, The Mogal, Marguerite swore she’d bring the killers to justice.

$1.49 FREE when you subscribe today!

As a subscriber, you'll also get a weekly email with:

NEW SHORT STORIES
Direct links to new stories posted online.
INSTANT DOWNLOADS
Download longer short stories directly from your email!
FREE WEEKLY NOVELLA
Access to a novella-length story, normally $0.99 - 3.99.
EARLY NOTIFICATION OF NEWLY RELEASE NOVELS
Buy them pre-launch for discounted prices, as much as 50% off!
WEEKLY DISCOUNT CODE
Subscriber-only discount codes for up to 15% off everything in our store.
